VoiceCallMetrics.name: VoiceCallMetrics
VoiceCallMetrics.description: Represents metrics for a VoiceCall lifecycle event, aggregated daily.

AverageSCVCallDuration.description: The average call duration, measured in minutes, for a given day.

AvgMessagesPerCall.description: The average number of transcription messages per call for a given day.

InboundCallsAgentsConnected.description: The number of inbound calls where agents connect with callers for a given day.

MaxMessagesPerCall.description: The number of transcription messages for the call with the highest number of said messages for a given day.

MaxSCVCallDuration.description: The longest call duration, measured in minutes, for a given day.

MetricsDate.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the metric was gathered. For example, daily metrics jobs run at 12am local instance time (not UTC).

NumACWInitiated.description: The number of calls where After Conversation Work (ACW) is initiated for a given day.

NumCallbackCallsCtrCompleted.description: The number of callback calls where interactive voice response (IVR) data is fully and completely captured from a telephony provider for a given day.

NumInboundCallsCtrCompleted.description: The number of inbound calls where interactive voice response (IVR) data is fully and completely captured from a telephony provider for a given day.

NumInboundIVRAbandonCalls.description: The number of inbound calls where callers disconnected while waiting in the interactive voice response (IVR) system for a given day.

NumInboundQueueAbandonCalls.description: The number of inbound calls where callers disconnected while waiting in the queue for a given day.

NumOutboundCallsCtrCompleted.description: The number of outbound calls where interactive voice response (IVR) data is fully and completely captured from a telephony provider for a given day.

NumRecordedCalls.description: The number of calls where the conversation between an agent and caller is recorded for a given day.

NumSCVCallbackCalls.description: The number of callback calls for a given day.

NumSCVInboundCalls.description: The number of inbound calls for a given day.

NumSCVOutboundCalls.description: The number of outbound calls for a given day.

NumSCVTransferCalls.description: The number of transfer calls for a given day.

NumTransferCallsCtrCompleted.description: The number of transfer calls where interactive voice response (IVR) data is fully and completely captured from a telephony provider for a given day.

OutboundCallsAgentsConnected.description: The number of outbound calls where an agent is connected with a caller for a given day.

TotalACWInboundMinutes.description: The total number of minutes agents spent in After Conversation Work (ACW) for inbound calls for a given day.

TotalACWOutboundMinutes.description: The total number of minutes agents spent in After Conversation Work (ACW) for outbound calls for a given day.

TotalAgentInboundMinutes.description: The total number of minutes agents spent talking to callers on inbound calls for a given day.

TotalHoldDurationMinutes.description: The number of minutes callers were put on hold for a given day.

TotalIVRInboundMinutes.description: The total number of minutes callers spent in the IVR system on inbound calls for a given day.

TotalMessages.description: The total number of transcription messages for a given day.

TotalOutboundMinutes.description: The total number of minutes agents spent talking to callers on outbound calls for a given day.

TotalQueueInboundMinutes.description: For inbound calls, the total number of minutes callers spent in the queue waiting for a given day.
